title: Shame will haunt New York Times leadership
description: Except for an occasional opinion piece, The New York Times has gone out of its way to avoid using the word “genocide” when referring to Gaza — even as human rights organizations, U.N. bodies, parliaments, and scholars increasingly do so. The New York Times is the paper of record. U.S. policy and politicians, from mayors...
